actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that widow's and widower's insurance benefits, as well as old-age insurance benefits, may be increased by the application of the delayed retirement credit.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide that widow's and widower's insurance benefits, as well as old-age insurance benefits, shall be increased by application of the delayed retirement credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that widow's and widower's insurance benefits, as well as old-age insurance benefits, may be increased by the application of the delayed retirement credit.
